column1: I like the fact that this is pretty much a natural product and it has a nice creamy texture and has a nice color. However, it did not give my skin much of a glow. I mixed some Loreal Magic Lumi primer with it and the two together make a good color and glow to the skin when you don't want to put on actual makeup which is pretty much all the time with me.

I got this product as a sample when I bought the micellar water and I loved it so much that I went out and bought a full-size. I use this every day (I don't wear foundation) as a tinted moisturizer. It doesn't add a lot of color (which I like for school) but has just enough to make me look glowy. I have used this every day for the past two months and I recommend it to all my friends!
I put this on over my moisturizer and before foundation, then let it dry. Next is foundation, powder, etc. I think this is a FABULOUS product, and I will be purchasing it again!
I can't understand why several people gave bad references.
I used this today, & it was good. Its different from other face scrubs. I like it better than aveeno. Its more gentle.

It did make my face glowy, & my face felt soft. My skin was a little dry but that's ok cuz I just put my Neutrogena hydro boost gel cream after. It worked out well. This scrub also brightened my face. Thank you, garnier for making good products.

The product is a soft, supple gel. It didn't feel bad on my face, but I didn't leave it on for long. I splashed water on my face, applied the mask and decided to apply more water to use as a scrub soon after. My skin immediately felt soft and smooth! It also looked very clean and fresh! I'm very pleased with these results and highly recommend this product! I just didn't like it sitting on my face for several minutes.

Garnier Glow Boost Illuminating moisturizer by Garnier SkinActive really moisturizes your skin and it looks more youthful instantly. It has a slight tint and shimmer which gives your skin a glow. Also make-up seems to blend well while using this product as a base moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Garnier skinactive glow boost illuminating moisturizer smelled good & was moisturizing. Gave me a little glow. I have sensitive skin & it did not break me out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like it but it kinda leaves a greasy feel on the skin that i didnt really like mayne for someone who has dry skin well work but i dont think anyone with combination skin type [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub is ok. The consistency doesn't feel like a scrub or a mask, kind of like a thick jelly. The scrub feels like it does nothing (not much scrub to it) and neither does the mask (supposed to make skin “glow.”) I broke out all over my chin after using it. The only thing I liked was is smells good. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wasn't a fan of the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Fave Mask + Scrub. When using as a mask it would burn my skin, but when used as a scrub my face didn't feel clean without having to use another cleansing method after. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product made my skin feel softer and smoother and gave me a dewy glow. My makeup glides effortlessly over it. I recommend this product in lieu of a highlighter for a natural girl next door look. I received this product as a free sample through pinchme.com [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier's SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is a nice, light touch- non-greasy and very lightweight. A silky texture and very subtle, tasteful peachy glow. Adds a little touch of summer to the skin any time of year. I'm a fan! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I rcvd this full size product sample from Pinch Me, and I'm thrilled that I did! I'm usually not that crazy about this brand, but I love the new line up. Moisturizers are always iffy for me, and I find myself sticking to my tried and true, but I'm glad that this one works pretty good. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I LOVE this. I have a pretty dry T zone. And thrus gives my skin a fresh revivied glowly bu subtle look. I love how creamy and lightweight it is. Definetly going to be picking this up again.

I have sensitive skin, and am very picky with moisturizers. Got this as a sample, and I'm hooked! It goes on light and smooth, it absorbs into my skin really well, and does not leave my face greasy feeling. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a full size sample for free from pinchme of this skin active glow boost illuminating moisturizer. I love it! It works great as a primer and also as an all day moisturizer. I highly recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial mask & scrub was not for me. I used it several times but I didn't like the feel of it after I used it. It made it oily so I didn't feel like my face was clean. I did however give to my mom and she absolutely loves it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wasn't a fan of Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub. It has little plastic beads in it that don't dissolve and if you wash your ears or around nose, they get stuck in and around the area. I gave it to my little sister and I'm sure she will use it. I would not buy it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was so surprised to receive a full size sample! I found it weird to have both a mask and a scrub in one. Did not like using it as a mask but maybe I need to use more water. My skin did not feel super soft after exfoliating. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the peachy-apricot smell of the Garnier SkinActive Glow boost illuminating moisturizer as well as its consistency which makes it so easy to work with, without giving that greasy feeling. I am residing in a state with extreme cold temperatures which demands that extra care to prevent dry skin and this product comes in as a good option to avert that. This was a free product I received from PINCHme!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I receive a sample of the brand Garnier SkinActive and the product is a Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer and is great. I love the smell, after you use your face looks soft and shiny, i recommended. Is a great moisturizer specially for winter when your skin is more dry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved Garnier SkinActive Glow boost illuminating moisturizer as a sample from Pinchme. I love this product it added a glow without looing like i was sweating like a pig. I put this product on my face before I put on my makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is just what I needed in my daily skincare routine. I put it on after washing my face or immediately after a shower, it smells good and makes my skin look radiant and healthy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved this two weeks ago in a mail a full size product that's so amazing I love this product I tv has peachy tint that brightens face this moisturizer really gives me a healthier looking skin...I have combo skin most of the products give me acne that's why i hesitate to use new products but luckily it suits me very well i m definitely going to buy this moisturizer ...I used this with or without makeup and I truly in love with it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating moisturizer. I felt moisturized and glowing, but I also looked really oily and shiny. It works well as a highlighter. PinchMe have this to me for free to sample. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received garner skinactive glow boost illuminating moisturizer as a free sample from pinchme.com. i love this product it definitely gives your skin a healthy nourished glow! It's great to use with foundation or without. Highly recommend this moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer for free from PinchMe. I love the natural glow it gives my skin so I had to give it to my mom to try out too. She really likes it and is planning on buying some for herself when we run out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love how the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer smells. Refreshing! My skin is sensitive though and did not work for me. Definitely would recommend to my friends and family despite my issues because I feel Garnier is a great brand. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Lucky enough to use Garnier SkinActive for the past few weeks and I am hooked!! Not only is this a hydrating and lightweight moisturizer, but it gives my skin such a healthy glow. The name Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is the perfect name for this product, it does exactly that!! Will definitely keep using this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

the glow boost was nice, it worked as a primer ok. however I enjoy it as an after shower face moisturizer. or a morning moisturizer when I dont want to wear makeup. it kept me hydrated for sure, just not too sure about this glow factor...maybe it takes more time [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer. It works great as a moisturizer and gives my skin a faint glow. I mostly like it because it works well as a primer under my make-up. It seems to smooth out my skin so my make-up looks flawless. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive moisturizer kept up to the brands name and quality. I love this product, my skin sucks it up and the “illuminating” effect is subtle but present. I have very dry face which is prone to acne but I have noticed no break ups since I've started using the Glow boost illuminating moisturizer. I will purchase after this sample is finished :). The only down side for me is that I have to layer it on in order to moisturize my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer by Garnier SkinActive is my new daily go too. For the mornings I just have to wash and go this is a quick fix to looking a bit more recharged. Skin feels so soft once applied. Gives a highlighted dewy look without looking wet or greasy. Perfect to use alone or under makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub by Garnier SkinActive in exchange for an honest review from PinchMe. I thought this face mask/ scrub was good. I prefer to use it as a scrub over a mask personally. Also it smells good! I wouldn't say it was the best face scrub I've used and I didn't see a dramatic change or anything, just smoother skin emmediatly after use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample of the product Garnier skinactive glow booost 2 in 1 facial mask + scrub from PinchMe. I really liked this product, it had a nice smell and texture. What I didn't like is that it left my skin feeling dry after washing it off. Other than that I loved it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub was a great product. I've used an apricot scrub in the past and this worked just as well. It exfoliated the dry winter skin off my face and made it soft afterwards. A great add to my face routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free full-sized sample of the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub to try from Pinch Me. I really enjoy using this product and typically use it 2-3 times per week as both a mask and scrub. I have definitely noticed my skin looking and feeling smoother and more hydrated since I started using it. This mask + scrub smells great and isn't too rough on my sensitive skin. I also love that this product is made without parabens, dyes, sulfates, and silicones. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got to try the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2 in 1 Facial Mask + Scrub free from Pinchme, and I love it. I've used it as both a scrub and mask and like it better as a mask. It smells so good, and after I washed it off my skin after one use i could already see a difference! This is definitely going to become a staple in my skincare routine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample of the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub from PINCHme in exchange for a review. This 2-in-1 mask/exfoliated is easy to apply. I let it sit the 3-5 minutes and then I added a little water, massaged the mask, and then rinsed, as per instructions. My skin felt smooth, moisturized, and I look forward to trying it again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample of Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub from PINCHme and got a chance to try it. ! It smells wonderful, feels good, has nice texture and it does its job of a scrub very well.
The only issue is that there was no protective seal. I wish it had it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier Skin Active glow boost 2 in 1 facial mask and scrub is amazing! It has a great scent and exfoliates without being too harsh on your skin. Its a great value for the price and the size 9f the jar. My face felt cleaner and was glowing after using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
For being a "glowing facial moisturizer", there certainly are a lot of ingredients. And for shame..... none of them are sunscreens.
The smell is great and my skin felt clean after, but applying it was a mess and impossibly to get on evenly, it kind of stayed in sticky clumps. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I got a sample of this in the mail from PINCHme...so happy to try it. It smells so nice and clean and really leaves my skin moisturized and fresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

First Garnier is a great brand. Garnier SkinActive is very interesting, the Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is absolutely wonderful. It's very light, it definitely exceeded my expectations. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer" is a very great product I honestly felt a difference in my skin when I used this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this moisturizer. It gives a natural glow makes my face feel smooth and hydrated without feeling oily or making my skin feel heavy [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The “ Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer” from Garner Skin Active is good. It keeps the skin soft and lasts for more than I expected. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I generally liked the product. It made my skin look and feel nice. But I have very oily skin and I feel like this moisturizer just made it worse. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is a great product. I loved how it felt on my skin. It gave my skin a nice glow. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wanted to like this product so bad. Initially, when I used the mask, it made my skin glow and felt nice but then, i started noticing breakouts on my skin; and these were the big under the skin ones.
The Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer is great. Like to use it in the morning before I start the day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love the garnier skinactive glow boost illuminating moisturizer it makes my skin feel soft and refreshed doesn't make me break out and isn't heavy on my face [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this Free Garnier SkonActive Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer from PinchMe. Smells wonderfully and works just as well leaves my face feelong fresh and looking good! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have never tried the Garnier SkinActive skin line but when I received the Glow Boost Illuminating Moisturizer and I love it! So light and perfect for primer or days I don't want to wear makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this moisturizer to review it from Pinchme. I am using it as a primer. I love it specially now in the cold to keep my face moistutized while I have my makeup on. I recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Great product. Usually I don't buy drugstore skin care products. But I'm glad I did. It made my skin hydrated, soft and glowy. I'll definitely keep buying it. I'm hooked! :)

Love the fact it leaves my face looking and feeling smooth. Not to mention the light scent. I most definitely will purchase more. A little goes a long way seriously. I purchased base off previous reviews.

Love the fact it leaves my face looking and feeling smooth. Not to mention the light scent. I most definitely will purchase more. A little goes a long way seriously. I purchased base off previous reviews.

I'm pretty sure all the positive reviews are from people paid to use the product. My face is disgustingly oily after applying this moisturizer. There's a greasy film all over my face. I do not feel glowy or peachy. Just gross.

I really like this! My skin tends to get really dry in the winter. This helps hydrate my skin and exfoliate it all in one product! I like the texture as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This mask/scrub combo was different than what I expected. It tightens as it exfoliates. I enjoy using it, but the scent is kind of annoying. Would prefer something less strong scented [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2 in 1 facial mask and scrub from PinchMe. I am really liking it. The texture is nice and I love the results. Loving this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Garnier's SkinActive's Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub was great to use. It smelled good and left my skin feeling soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Absolutely loved the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub
It left my skin smooth and took away the dead dry skin. And it was not to rough [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely loved the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2 in 1 Facial Mask and Scrub. It left my skin feeling fresh and clean. It has a nice scent and is refreshing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I enjoyed using this as a scrub. My face was a little too sensitive to use as a face mask. I did think it did a good job as an exfoliant [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 facial mask + scrub! It smells so great and it works really well. I love being able to use it as either a scrub or mask too. I received it as a free sample from PINCHme but I will definitely be buying more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great multifunctional product. It has a nice smell & consistency. When you use it as a mask it has a nice little tingle to it, & as a scrub the little powdered shell bits exfoliate nicely. The only thing I didn't like is that the jar is almost impossible to open in the shower with wet hands. You can't get a grip on it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved my Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-n-1 Facial Mask + Scrub for free from Pinchme in exchange for my opinion. First of all, I love that it is a vegan formula. That says a lot about Garnier. It has a pleasant scent and is nice as a gentle scrub. I actually like using it as a mask before I get in the shower and then use it as a scrub before I rinse it off. Works great and exposes new glowy skin! Affordable luxury is my favorite! Thanks Garnier! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Garnier SkinActive Glow Boosr 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub is amazing. I use it as a daily scrub, and it doesn't dry my skin out - which I love. It smells great, leaves my skin feeling great, and I've now switched to using this product instead of what I was using before. I absolutely recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love my pinch me sample of Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2 in 1 Facial Mask + Scrub. Left my skin feeling exfoliated, smooth and refreshed. Eliminates having various different products as this is two products in one!!!! Great time saver and a product that I would highly recommend!!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub as a sample in exchange for my honest review. I enjoyed this as a scrub,although I never tried it as a mask. It was light, refreshing, and smelled great. It was a great compliment to the glow boost moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this mask/scrub I will definitely be purchasing in the future when I run out of the generous sample I received. It leaves my skin soft and glowing, it is great to use prior to makeup application it leaves an ideal canvas. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub was a great smelling scrub and it left my skin very smooth after washing my face. After 3 applications, my skin looked refreshed and looked like it glowed. I recommend it for those who would like there face to feel smooth and more refreshed. I received this scrub for free as a sample from PINCHme. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Received the garnier skin active face mask and scrub from Pinchme and over all I really like the product. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Only issue I have is when it is initially applied it does have a warming tingle which I prefer not to have on any facial product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this awesome facial scrub from pinchme.com called Garnier Skin acive glow boost 2 in 1 facial mask and scrub. It made my skin radiant and I love the dual purpose. Will be buying more soon! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub is fabulous. I like how it's a two-in-one which saves time and money. It's super easy to use, smells great and a wonderful product. I'd highly recommend you give it a try for an in-home spa experience. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the product Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask Scrub from PINCHme for free. It was a wonderful face mask. My daughter used it also and it really didn't work at first but she keep using it and it works. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that this doesn't require me to leave it on for an extended period of time. i have noticed with a lot of masks it makes my face get hot and turn red, this DOES make my face warm, but doesn't set it on fire. I use it when it is super cold outside and my face is crazy dry, gives me some nice hydration. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This has been fantastic for my skin... the grains are really fine and it comes in a jelly like substance which is interesting to feel. My skin loves it and it's been great for my skin. I will definitely be buying more [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub. It did a great job exfoliating. And it was gentle on my skin. I love that it is a versatile product being a mask and a scrub. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the Garnier Skinactive Glow Boost 2 In 1 Facial Mask and Scrub. My daughter and I both have used it and it leaves your face so smooth and totally glowing. It is so quick and easy to use as well. I love anything that shows results quickly and this is it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Just in time for winter I received the Garnier Skinactive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub in the mail. I got this product for free from PINCHme and I couldn't wait to try a new exfoliating scrub. Since I don't use physical exfoliants on my face anymore, too irritating, I can't speak to the mask part of the product. The scrub worked great all over my body leaving my skin much smoother than before. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After trying Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub by Garnier SkinActive, I think I have found a new favorite. I tend to use very high end beauty products, so when I tell you that this blew my mind and won me over... TRUST ME! It gives you a refreshing kind of tingle, but then leaves your face feeling and looking years younger and healthier!! It now has a permanent spot on my vanity!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Thanks to Pinchme I got to try this product for free! I love trying facial masks and the Glow boost 2-in-1 Facial mask + scrub by Garnier didn't disappoint! I love that I can use it to quickly wash and exfoliate my face or If I have a few minutes to treat myself I can use it as a mask! I have sensitive skin and it doesn't break me out! Leave my skin smooth and glowing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the Garnier skin active glow boost 2 in 1 facial mask + scrub for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I've been using the scrub 2x a week and it's been working great during this dry season. I use it in the shower leave it on for 3 mins or so and scrub away and it leaves my skin feeling nice and smooth and doesn't dry out my skin. However I knocked off one star because I don't notice a glowing effect. Smells great too and will continue to use regularly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample from PinchMe. My face didn't appear to be glowing after I used it, though it felt clean. I have a hard time getting all the hard bits of apricot pit off of my skin. I've used better, reasonably priced facial products to get a healthy glow. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActucs Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask and Scrub was surprisingly nice. It smells good and my sensitive skin didn��t react. I tend to stay away from scrubs and use chemical exfoliants instead so I liked that this product was multipurpose. I don't know if I'd buy it again - nothing wrong with it per se but I didn't feel like it had enough benefits to warrant another purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The first thing I noticed about this product was the wonderful smell. It's quite lovely. The scrub is not too harsh it's absolutely perfect. I highly recommend Garner SkinActive's Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked the exfoliation aspect of this scrub. My face felt fresh and clean afterwards. However, I didn't notice any added benefits when I used it as a mask. So I'll keep using it, but probably won't spend the time to use it as a mask. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was interested to try Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-1 Facial Mask + Scrub on my combination skin. The scrub helped with my dry winter skin and smells fruity and delicious. Would recommend for an everyday facial cleanser to keep in the shower. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was lucky enough to try a sample of the Garnier Skin Active Glow Boost scrub/face mask. Overall I was happy with this product. I used it daily and it did leave my skin feeling soft. The scent was light and refreshing. I wouldn't consider this a face mask though. More if an exfoliating cleanser. My skin was soft to the touch but unfortunately it didn't help with my acne. I saw no difference with that issue. But overall good product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is an amazing mask and scrub. I absolutely love it. I use it every other day in the shower and it leaves my face feeling smooth with a healthy glow. I've even gotten my husband to use it a couple of times! :-) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love my skin after using GARNIER SKINACTIVE GLOW BOOST 2-IN-1 FACIAL MASK + SCRUB! I love how it is a face mask and scrub all in one. It has an amazing fresh scent. The scrub left my skin feeling soft and clean. I feel like it got rid of all the dead skin, and my skin looks amazing. My teenage daughter has also been using this product. Since using it, she has had alot less break outs and clearer skin. I will definitely continue using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub!! The ease of using this product is great and it left my skin feeling amazingly smooth. I like the 2-in-1 aspect that allows for 2 different ways of using this product; very innovative. Thank you, PINCHme, for the free sample!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub is an ok product. I was hoping for more exfoliating properties as my face is dry and peeling from the dry winter air, but my skin didn't seem much better after using this. It does smell delicious, thought~ [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the "Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask and Scrub by Garnier SkinActive from PINCHme for review and I must say it surprised me. When I opened the jar the texture was a bit off-putting and I was expecting it to be very oily and greasy on the skin but it wasn't, it left my skin feeling soft and smooth. I'm not sure how much exfoliating it actually did, as it feels very gentle. I would definitely recommend this for people with oily, sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was a good product. I use it a couple of times a week to exfoliate my skin and release a dewy glow. It keeps my skin soft and moisturized after each use with no drying of the skin at all. I have oily skin so I thought it may keep my skin too oily but didn't have that at all. It was the right amount of moisture. I definitely recommend this for those looking to rejuvenate their skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier SkunActivr Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask+Scrub is too die for. I absolutely love it. Some days I'm in a hurry so I scrub my face with it and run out the door. Other days I leave it on for a more refreshed feeling. I am almost out of it already so I will be running to the store to get more. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Garnier Skinactive in Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub was a fun product to try! The gel-like consistency of the product was a surprise but I liked it! I trues the product both ways as a mask and as a scrub with my Clarisonic. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have secured a new staple in my shower routine with the Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub. It's the perfect way to ensure that my routine has a quick element of relaxation and easy indulgence. My skin has never felt better! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received my free bottle of Garnier SkinActive Glow Boost 2-in-1 Facial Mask + Scrub from Pinchme. I have used it 3 times now as a scrub and it leaves my face feeling clean, soft, smooth and refreshed. The scent is amazing is stays with you on even after wiping it away. Garnier is one of my favorite brands so I will definitely be adding this product to my regular list of facial cleansers. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
